comment: /**  * Checks whether the provided path matches the suffix pattern, i.e. "/foo/bar" will match the pattern "bar".  *  * @param path The path to match. Must not be null.  * @return true iff this path is a suffix match.  */
code: /**  * Checks whether the provided path matches the suffix pattern, i.e. "/foo/bar" will match the pattern "bar".  *  * @param path The path to match. Must not be null.  * @return true iff this path is a suffix match.  */ public boolean isSuffixMatch(String path) {     return pattern.matcher(path).matches(). }
